mapper.select: SELECT url, method, COUNT(*) AS request_count, AVG(size) AS avg_time, MAX(size) AS max_time FROM request_log WHERE time >= NOW() - INTERVAL 1 DAY -- 过去一天 GROUP BY url, method ORDER BY avg_time DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT url, method, COUNT(*) AS request_count FROM request_log WHERE time >= NOW() - INTERVAL 1 DAY GROUP BY url, method ORDER BY request_count DESC LIMIT 10

SELECT url, method, COUNT(*) AS request_count, MIN(time) AS start_time FROM request_log WHERE time >= NOW() - INTERVAL 1 HOUR GROUP BY url, method, UNIX_TIMESTAMP(time) DIV 1 -- 1秒内的请求数 HAVING request_count > 100 ORDER BY request_count DESC;

SELECT url, method, COUNT(*) AS error_count, COUNT(*) * 100 / (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM request_log) AS error_rate FROM request_log WHERE status_code NOT LIKE '2%' -- 过滤 2xx 成功请求 AND time >= NOW() - INTERVAL 1 DAY GROUP BY url, method ORDER BY error_count DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT ip, COUNT(*) AS request_count FROM request_log WHERE time >= NOW() - INTERVAL 1 DAY GROUP BY ip ORDER BY request_count DESC LIMIT 10;
